trans-unit.source: Triangle primitive for building a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] shape.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成基元三角形[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]形状。

trans-unit.source: MeshGeometry3D allows the developer to specify position, normal, and texture coordinate information.
trans-unit.target: MeshGeometry3D 允许开发人员指定位置、 正常、 和纹理坐标信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A> property is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>属性是必需的。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normals are assumed to be associated with the front faces of a mesh primitive.
trans-unit.target: 法线假定要与基元网格的正面相关联。

trans-unit.source: The winding order (the order in which the Positions that make up each triangle of the mesh are specified) determines whether a given face is front-facing or back-facing.
trans-unit.target: 绕序 （在其中指定构成每个三角形的网格的位置的顺序） 确定了给定的面是正面或面向后的。

trans-unit.source: Front-facing triangles are wound in counter-clockwise order; back-facing triangles are wound in clockwise order.
trans-unit.target: 面向靠前的三角形缠绕逆时针顺序;面向后的三角形缠绕顺时针旋转的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取边界<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref>此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Bounding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bounding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of normal vectors for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置有关的法向量的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Normal vectors are vectors perpendicular to the face of each triangle that defines a mesh.
trans-unit.target: 法向量是垂直的表面的每个三角形，用于定义网格的向量。

trans-unit.source: Normals determine whether a given triangle face is lit.
trans-unit.target: 法线确定是否亮起给定的三角形面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> allows the developer to specify position, normal, and texture coordinate information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>允许开发人员指定位置、 正常、 和纹理坐标信息。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>

trans-unit.source: Normals are assumed to be associated with the front faces of a mesh primitive.
trans-unit.target: 法线假定要与基元网格的正面相关联。

trans-unit.source: The winding order (the order in which the Positions that make up each triangle of the mesh are specified) determines whether a given face is front-facing or back-facing.
trans-unit.target: 绕序 （在其中指定构成每个三角形的网格的位置的顺序） 确定了给定的面是正面或面向后的。

trans-unit.source: If normals are not specified, their generation depends on whether the developer has specified triangle indices for the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定法线，其生成取决于是否开发人员已指定三角形索引的网格。

trans-unit.source: If triangle indices are specified, normals will be generated that take into account adjacent faces.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了三角形索引，法线将生成到相邻面采用。

trans-unit.source: If triangle indices are not specified, only one normal will be generated for the specified triangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定三角形索引，将为指定的三角形生成只有一个正常。

trans-unit.source: This might cause a faceted appearance in the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 在网格中，这可能会导致分面外观。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3DCollection"></xref> that contains the normal vectors for the MeshGeometry3D.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3DCollection"></xref>其中包含 MeshGeometry3D 法向量。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Normals*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of vertex positions for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的顶点位置集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The points specifed by this property represent the vertices of the triangles that make up a 3-D mesh.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的点表示构成三维网格三角形的顶点。

trans-unit.source: The winding order (the order in which the Positions that make up each triangle of the mesh are specified) determines whether a given face is front-facing or back-facing.
trans-unit.target: 绕序 （在其中指定构成每个三角形的网格的位置的顺序） 确定了给定的面是正面或面向后的。

trans-unit.source: Front-facing triangles are wound in counter-clockwise order; back-facing triangles are wound in clockwise order.
trans-unit.target: 面向靠前的三角形缠绕逆时针顺序;面向后的三角形缠绕顺时针旋转的顺序。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3DCollection"></xref> that contains the vertex positions of the MeshGeometry3D.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3DCollection"></xref>包含 MeshGeometry3D 的顶点位置。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.Positions*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of texture coordinates for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的纹理坐标集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Texture coordinates determine how a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material> is mapped to the vertices of the triangles that make up a mesh.
trans-unit.target: 纹理坐标确定如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>映射到构成网格三角形的顶点。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>

trans-unit.source: **Note** If no texture coordinates are specified for a MeshGeometry3D, its Material might not render as expected.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**如果没有纹理坐标为 MeshGeometry3D 指定，其材料不可能按预期方式呈现。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> that contains the texture coordinates for the MeshGeometry3D.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>其中包含 MeshGeometry3D 纹理坐标。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TextureCoordinates*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of triangle indices for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的三角形索引的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a triangle in a given 3-D mesh, the order in which the triangle's vertex positions are specified determines whether the triangle face is a front or back face.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的三维三角形网格三角形的顶点位置指定确定三角形面是否是正面的顺序还是背面。

trans-unit.source: The [Windows Presentation Foundation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 3-D implementation uses a counter-clockwise winding order; that is, the points that determine a front-facing mesh triangle's positions should be specified in counterclockwise order, as viewed from the front of the mesh.
trans-unit.target: [Windows Presentation Foundation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)三维实现使用逆时针方向绕序; 也就是说，确定正面网格三角形的位置的点应指定采用逆时针顺序，如从前面的网格中查看。

trans-unit.source: Setting the TriangleIndices property is optional.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TriangleIndices 属性是可选的。

trans-unit.source: If the indices are not specified, triangles are drawn in a non-indexed fashion.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的索引，以一种非索引化的方式绘制三角形。

trans-unit.source: Every set of three positions becomes a triangle.
trans-unit.target: 每个集的三个位置将成为一个三角形。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the triangle indices of the MeshGeometry3D.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 MeshGeometry3D 三角形索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TriangleIndices*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TriangleIndices*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D.TriangleIndices*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
